text:
Hey folks! My team at Klaviyo published a deep dive on customer-first marketing as the new growth playbook for ecommerce brands as the cookie-less era comes to be. We researched a lot about how human centered design works and used that as a baseline for this new marketing mindset... which starts with *literally* talking to your customers. Would love to have folks read it and let us know what you think!

Here's the promo tweet: <https://twitter.com/TraceWall/status/1502334939819356166>
